name: Screen Saver (Agama Labs)
description:
Epic game for boring days!

Watch square moving around the screen using very epic A.I. (just kidding). Collect seconds and buy new and even more epic squares! You need to play this game because is just EPIC! Do not belive us? Just download and try it yourself! Epic simulation game waiting for you!

Some Info

This game was made in three days for fun, and its terrible (i mean Epic). Game was developed by main Agama Labs programmer - PogLoop

You can lso join aour Agama discord - here

This app isn't supposed to "save" your screen!

Game is currently in early acess.

Planned updates
